function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aerosolization and sampling can lead to survival of infectious viruses, increasing the risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate protective equipment and ventilation systems, and strict adherence to infection control measures","Technologies":"Air purification and UV-C disinfection systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Health organizations, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Differences in survival rates of viruses in different suspension media can impact disease transmission","Impact":"Varied survivability of viruses in the environment, affecting disease spread","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate disinfection protocols for different types of viruses and suspension media","Technologies":"Disinfectants, cleaning agents, and UV-C disinfection systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Health organizations, facility managers, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"UV susceptibility of viral aerosols varies with different viruses and RH levels, affecting the effectiveness of UV-C disinfection","Impact":"Inconsistent disinfection outcomes, leading to potential virus spread","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of UV-C exposure levels based on specific virus susceptibility and environmental conditions","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, environmental monitoring equipment","People":"General population, healthcare workers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Health organizations, facility managers, building owners"}]}
